price: Mobεkae deε mereka kyerε mo yi, na medeε mede mensεm ama Nyankopͻn. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn na Ohunu Nenkoa nom“.
arabic: فَسَتَذۡكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمۡرِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fasatadhkurūna mā aqūlu lakum wa-ufawwiḍu amrī ilā al-lahi inna al-laha baṣīrun bil-ʿibādi
